biography: Lillian Carlson was born on February 9, 1927 in Phoenix, British Columbia, Canada as Lillian Hilda Carlson. She was an actress, known for Saving Silverman (2001), Huckleberry Finn and His Friends (1979) and Replicant (2001). She was married to Lee Butcher. She died on November 1, 2011 in Vancouver, British Columbia.
name: Lillian Carlson
